mapper.select: SELECT comment1_no, board1_no, comment1_content, comment1_regdate, comment1_isshow, member_name, member_class FROM comment1 WHERE board1_no=${board1_no} AND comment1_isshow='Y' ORDER BY comment1_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment1(board1_no, comment1_content, comment1_regdate, comment1_isshow, member_name, member_class) VALUES(#{board1_no},#{comment1_content},now(),'Y','John Doe','A')
mapper.update: UPDATE comment1 SET comment1_content=#{comment1_content} WHERE comment1_no=#{comment1_no}
UPDATE comment1 SET comment1_isshow='N' WHERE comment1_no = #{comment1_no}
